insights.visual: Strong visual engagement with consistent content quality and good thumbnail optimization.
insights.audio: Good audio clarity, maintain consistent sound levels and music integration.
insights.energy: Energy levels are low. Boost your on-camera presence and content pacing.
insights.interaction: Interaction needs improvement. Add more questions, polls, and direct audience engagement.
insights.linguistic: Solid communication style, could enhance storytelling techniques and script quality.
insights.contextual: Content feels disconnected from current trends. Research popular topics and adapt faster.
insights.environmental: Well-maintained production quality with good lighting and clean backgrounds.
insights.governance: Excellent authenticity with organic growth patterns and genuine engagement.

summary.overall: Excellent governance integrity (BMIL 0.9) with strong visual & audio layers. However, interaction and energy layers are low, indicating the need for higher audience connection and on-camera enthusiasm.

aiInsights.title: Exceptional Governance Performance
aiInsights.description: Excellent authenticity with organic growth patterns and genuine engagement.

aiInsights.title: Improve Interaction
aiInsights.description: Add more questions, polls, and reactive dialogue to increase ERI score.
